TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ArcSegment extends System.Windows.Media.PathSegment
Public NotInheritable Class ArcSegment Inherits PathSegment
public ref class ArcSegment sealed : System::Windows::Media::PathSegment

summary.span: 表示两点之间的一条椭圆弧。

span.span: Represents an elliptical arc between two points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要存储对象对象和其他段。Use a object to store objects and other segments. 一条椭圆弧由其起点和终点，x 轴半径和 y 的半径，x 轴旋转的比例，值，该值指示弧是否应大于 180 度和一个描述的方向绘制弧将值定义。An elliptical arc is defined by its start and end points, x- and y-radius, x-axis rotation factor, a value indicating whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees, and a value describing the direction in which the arc is drawn. 类并不包含弧线的起始点的属性; 它只定义了它所代表的圆弧的终点。The class does not contain a property for the starting point of the arc; it only defines the destination point of the arc it represents. 圆弧的起点是当前的点到添加。The beginning point of the arc is the current point of the to which the is added. 下图演示不同的终结点， ，和设置。The following illustrations demonstrate the different end point, , and settings. ![具有不同 Point 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "具有不同 Point 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different Point settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments with different Point settings") ![具有不同 Size 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "具有不同 Size 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different Size settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "ArcSegments with different Size settings") ![具有不同 RotationAngle 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "具有不同 RotationAngle 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings") ## IsLargeArc 和 SweepDirectionIsLargeArc and SweepDirection 对于大多数弧的特定位置、 大小和轮换，有四个不同弧可绘制;和属性指示要使用哪些弧。For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the and properties indicate which arc to use. 四个候选弧线扫描，两个表示大弧扫描的 180 度或更高版本，另外两个表示与扫描 180 度或更少的小弧。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果是**true**，则两个较大弧线扫描之一是选; 否则为如果是**false**、 一个较小弧的选择扫描。If is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 剩余的两个弧候选每绘制在一个不同的方向：或。The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: or . 属性指定要使用哪一种。The property specifies which one to use. 下图显示了不同和设置。The following illustrations show different and settings. ![具有不同 IsLargeArc 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "具有不同 IsLargeArc 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings") 具有不同 IsLargeArc 设置的 ArcSegment 对象ArcSegment objects with different IsLargeArc settings ![具有不同 SweepDirection 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "具有不同 SweepDirection 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings") 具有不同 SweepDirection 设置的 ArcSegment 对象ArcSegment objects with different SweepDirection settings ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features 是一种对象。An is a type of object. 璝惠功能，如冻结和克隆，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For information about features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类定义只有段弧线，它表示的目标点; 圆弧的起点是当前的点到其添加。The class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the , to which the is added. 对于最椭圆弧的特定位置、 大小和轮换，有四个不同弧可绘制;`largeArc`和`sweepDirection`参数指示要使用哪些弧。For most elliptical arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the `largeArc` and `sweepDirection` parameters indicate which arc to use. 四个候选弧线扫描，两个表示大弧扫描的 180 度或更高版本，另外两个表示与扫描 180 度或更少的小弧。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果`largeArc`是**true**，则两个较大弧线扫描之一是选; 否则为如果`largeArc`是**false**、 一个较小弧的选择扫描。If `largeArc` is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if `largeArc` is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 如果`sweepDirection`是，按正角方向绘制弧。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a positive-angle direction. 如果`sweepDirection`是，按负角方向绘制弧。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a negative-angle direction.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类定义只有段弧线，它表示的目标点; 圆弧的起点是当前的点到其添加。The class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the , to which the is added. 对于最椭圆弧的特定位置、 大小和轮换，有四个不同弧可绘制;`largeArc`和`sweepDirection`参数指示要使用哪些弧。For most elliptical arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the `largeArc` and `sweepDirection` parameters indicate which arc to use. 四个候选弧线扫描，两个表示大弧扫描的 180 度或更高版本，另外两个表示与扫描 180 度或更少的小弧。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果`largeArc`是**true**，则两个较大弧线扫描之一是选; 否则为如果`largeArc`是**false**、 一个较小弧的选择扫描。If `largeArc` is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if `largeArc` is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 如果`sweepDirection`是，按正角方向绘制弧。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a positive-angle direction. 如果`sweepDirection`是，按负角方向绘制弧。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a negative-angle direction.

MemberSignature.Value: public ArcSegment (System.Windows.Point point, System.Windows.Size size, double rotationAngle, bool isLargeArc, System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection sweepDirection, bool isStroked);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Point point, valuetype System.Windows.Size size, float64 rotationAngle, bool isLargeArc, valuetype System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection sweepDirection, bool isStroked) cil managed
public: ArcSegment(System::Windows::Point point, System::Windows::Size size, double rotationAngle, bool isLargeArc, System::Windows::Media::SweepDirection sweepDirection, bool isStroked);

param.name: point
param.span: 圆弧的终点；圆弧的起点定义为要添加 的 的当前点。

span.span: The destination point of the arc; the start point of the arc is defined as the current point of the to which the is added.

param.name: size
param.span: 圆弧的 x 轴和 y 轴半径。x 轴半径由 结构的 属性指定，y 轴半径由 结构的 属性指定。

span.span: The x- and y-radius of the arc. The x-radius is specified by the structure's property, and the y-radius is specified by the structure's property.

param.name: rotationAngle
param.span: 椭圆的 X 轴旋转。

span.span: The x-axis rotation of the ellipse.

param.name: isLargeArc
param.span: 圆弧是否应大于 180 度。

span.span: Whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees.

param.name: sweepDirection
param.span: 若按正角方向绘制圆弧，则设置为 ；若要按负角方向绘制圆弧，则设置为 。

span.span: Set to to draw the arc in a positive angle direction; set to to draw the arc in a negative angle direction.

param.name: isStroked
param.span: 若要在使用 呈现段时绘制圆弧，则设置为 true；否则设置为 false。

span.span: Set to true to stroke the arc when a is used to render the segment; otherwise, false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类定义只有段弧线，它表示的目标点; 圆弧的起点是当前的点到其添加。The class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the , to which the is added. 对于最椭圆弧的特定位置、 大小和轮换，有四个不同弧可绘制;`largeArc`和`sweepDirection`参数指示要使用哪些弧。For most elliptical arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the `largeArc` and `sweepDirection` parameters indicate which arc to use. 四个候选弧线扫描，两个表示大弧扫描的 180 度或更高版本，另外两个表示与扫描 180 度或更少的小弧。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果`largeArc`是**true**，则两个较大弧线扫描之一是选; 否则为如果`largeArc`是**false**、 一个较小弧的选择扫描。If `largeArc` is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if `largeArc` is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 如果`sweepDirection`是，按正角方向绘制弧。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a positive-angle direction. 如果`sweepDirection`是，按负角方向绘制弧。If `sweepDirection` is , the arc is drawn in a negative-angle direction.

summary.span: 创建此 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆的对象的 属性也将为

span.span: The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象 (或任何对象)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆的对象的 属性也将为 。

public: property bool IsLargeArc { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示弧是否应大于 180 度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees.

value.span: **true**如果弧应大于 180 度; 否则为**false**。

span.span: **true** if the arc should be greater than 180 degrees; otherwise, **false**.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数弧的特定位置、 大小和轮换，有四个不同弧可绘制;和属性指示要使用哪些弧。For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the and properties indicate which arc to use. 四个候选弧线扫描，两个表示大弧扫描的 180 度或更高版本，另外两个表示与扫描 180 度或更少的小弧。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果是**true**，则两个较大弧线扫描之一是选; 否则为如果是**false**、 一个较小弧的选择扫描。If is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 剩余的两个弧候选每绘制在一个不同的方向：或。The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: or . 属性指定要使用哪一种。The property specifies which one to use. 下图显示除相同的两条椭圆弧其设置。The following illustration shows two elliptical arcs that are identical except for their settings. ![具有不同 IsLargeArc 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "具有不同 IsLargeArc 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings") 具有不同 IsLargeArc 设置的 ArcSegment 对象ArcSegment objects with different IsLargeArc settings ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Point Point { System::Windows::Point get(); void set(System::Windows::Point value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置椭圆弧的终结点。

span.span: Gets or sets the endpoint of the elliptical arc.
The point to which the arc is drawn.
The default value is (0,0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类定义只有段弧线，它表示的目标点; 圆弧的起点是当前的点到添加。The class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the to which the is added. 如果圆弧线段的起点和终点都相同的不能绘制弧。If the arc segment's start point and end point are the same, no arc is drawn. 对于大多数弧的特定位置、 大小和轮换，有四个不同弧可绘制;和属性指示要使用哪些弧。For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the and properties indicate which arc to use. 四个候选弧线扫描，两个表示大弧扫描的 180 度或更高版本，另外两个表示与扫描 180 度或更少的小弧。Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less. 如果是**true**，则两个较大弧线扫描之一是选; 否则为如果是**false**、 一个较小弧的选择扫描。If is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen. 剩余的两个弧候选每绘制在一个不同的方向：或。The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: or . 属性指定要使用哪一种。The property specifies which one to use. 下图显示相同除外的几条椭圆弧其设置。The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their settings. ![具有不同 Point 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "具有不同 Point 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different Point settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments with different Point settings") 多个具有不同 Point 设置的 ArcSegment 对象Several ArcSegment objects with different Point settings ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double RotationAngle { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置椭圆围绕 x 轴旋转的量（以度为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount (in degrees) by which the ellipse is rotated about the x-axis.

value.span: 椭圆围绕 x 轴旋转的量（以度为单位）。

span.span: The amount (in degrees) by which the ellipse is rotated about the x-axis.
The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示相同除外的几条椭圆弧其设置。The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their settings. ![具有不同 RotationAngle 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "具有不同 RotationAngle 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings") 多个具有不同 RotationAngle 设置的 ArcSegment 对象Several ArcSegment objects with different RotationAngle settings 请注意，是否弧的宽度和高度相同，将此属性设置不起作用。Note that, if the arc's width and height are the same, setting this property has no effect. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置弧的 X 轴半径和 Y 轴半径作为 结构。

span.span: Gets or sets the x- and y-radius of the arc as a structure.

value.span: A描述 x-半径和 y 轴半径椭圆弧的结构。结构的属性指定弧的 x 轴半径; 其属性指定弧的 y 轴半径。

span.span: A structure that describes the x- and y-radius of the elliptical arc. The structure's property specifies the arc's x-radius; its property specifies the arc's y-radius.
The default value is 0,0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示相同除外的几条椭圆弧其设置。The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their settings. ![具有不同 Size 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "具有不同 Size 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different Size settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "ArcSegments with different Size settings") 多个具有不同 Size 设置的 ArcSegment 对象Several ArcSegment objects with different Size settings ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::SweepDirection SweepDirection { System::Windows::Media::SweepDirection get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::SweepDirection value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是以 方向还是以 方向绘制弧。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the arc is drawn in the or direction.

value.span: 一个指定弧的绘制方向的值。

span.span: A value that specifies the direction in which the arc is drawn.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关与给定， 、 开始点，日期和结束，可能会出现四个不同弧。For an with a given , , start point, and end , four different arcs are possible. 指定属性可能弧数减少到两个： 到末尾从起始点绘制一段弧线中方向和终结点在从起始点绘制一段弧线方向。Specifying the property reduces the number of possible arcs to two: an arc drawn from the start point to the end in a direction and an arc drawn from the start point to the end point in a direction. 下图显示除相同的两条椭圆弧其设置。The following illustration shows two elliptical arcs that are identical except for their settings. ![具有不同 SweepDirection 设置的 Arcsegment](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "具有不同 SweepDirection 设置的 Arcsegment")![ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings") 具有不同 SweepDirection 设置的 ArcSegment 对象ArcSegment objects with different SweepDirection settings ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None|

Public Shared ReadOnly SweepDirectionProperty As DependencyProperty

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.
